rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Cells with circles contain the digits 1 and 2. Cells with squares contain the digits 3 and 4.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Cells with circles contain the digits 1, 2 and 3. Cells with squares contain the digits 4, 5 and 6.
